item.title: 雪佛龙公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 石油巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）周五公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是产量增加帮助抵消了天然气价格疲软带来的冲击。【原文：Oil giant Chevron Corp beat estimates for first-quarter profit on Friday as higher production volumes helped offset a hit from weak natural gas prices.】

item.title: Alphabet 和微软业绩提振大型股，期指攀升
item.description: 美国股指期货周五上涨，原因是大型成长股在 Alphabet 和微软强劲的季度业绩支撑下反弹，同时投资者在等待可能有助于制定美国货币政策的关键通胀数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures advanced on Friday as megacap growth shares rebounded on the back of robust quarterly results from Alphabet and Microsoft, while investors awaited a key inflation print that could help shape U.S. monetary policy.】

item.title: 洞察力：比亚迪电动车出口售价为何是中国售价的两倍
item.description: 美国和欧洲的政界人士已经发出警报，他们的国内汽车产业可能会被中国廉价电动汽车的浪潮摧毁。但到目前为止，中国最大的电动汽车制造商比亚迪已经大幅提高了出口价格，而不是压低外国竞争对手的价格。【原文：U.S. and European politicians have raised alarms that their domestic auto industries could be destroyed by a wave of cheap Chinese electric vehicles. But so far, China's top EV maker, BYD, has dramatically hiked export prices compared to what it charges at home rather than undercut foreign rivals.】

item.title: 美国调查特斯拉因自动驾驶汽车召回 200 万辆汽车事件，引人关注
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周五表示，他们已开始调查特斯拉 12 月宣布召回 200 多万辆汽车以安装新的 Autopilot 保障措施是否充分。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulators said Friday they have opened an investigation into whether Tesla's recall of more than 2 million vehicles announced in December to install new Autopilot safeguards is adequate.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大科技股跷跷板翻转，日元大幅波动
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 中国交通银行一季度利润增长 1.44
item.description: 在经济放缓的背景下，中国交通银行股份有限公司（交行）第一季度净利润增长 1.44%。【原文：China's Bank of Communications Co Ltd (BoCom) , reported a 1.44% rise in first-quarter net profit amid a slowing economy.】

item.title: 贷款和消费者数据巩固了欧洲央行降息的理由
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）周五的报告显示，由于创纪录的高借贷成本不断给欧元区经济踩刹车，欧元区3月份的贷款继续停滞不前，消费者降低了通胀预期。【原文：Euro zone lending continued to stagnate in March and consumers trimmed their inflation expectations as record-high borrowing costs kept putting the brakes on the euro zone's economy, European Central Bank (ECB) reports showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国中信证券第一季度利润下降 8.5
item.description: 中国最大的券商中信证券股份有限公司周五公布第一季度净利润下降 8.5%。【原文：CITIC Securities Co , , China's biggest brokerage, on Friday reported an 8.5% fall in first-quarter net profit.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯第一季度因需求疲软亏损近三倍，但业绩超出预期
item.description: 由于需求疲软和北美市场表现不佳，伊莱克斯第一季度的营业亏损几乎增加了两倍，但由于原材料成本下降，亏损比预期的要小，股价因此上涨了 6%。【原文：Electrolux's operating loss nearly tripled in the first quarter on weak demand and poor performance in North America, but the loss was smaller than expected as raw material costs eased, sending shares up 6%.】

item.title: 华为智能汽车技术为汽车制造商提供中国销售之路
item.description: 华为仅用了四年时间就成为了智能汽车技术领域的一支生力军，在应对贸易制裁对其智能手机业务造成的破坏的同时，还开发出了成为北京车展宠儿的驾驶员辅助系统。【原文：It's taken Huawei just four years to become a force in smart car technology, navigating the devastation of trade sanctions on its smartphones business while simultaneously developing a driver assistance system that is the darling of the Beijing auto show.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 将以约 53.2 亿美元收购英国 Darktrace 公司
item.description: 私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 周五表示，已同意以约 53.2 亿美元现金收购英国网络安全公司 Darktrace。【原文：Private equity firm Thoma Bravo has agreed to buy British cybersecurity firm Darktrace for about $5.32 billion in cash, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行第一季度利润增至 43 亿美元
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行周五公布第一季度净利润为 3974 亿卢布（43.2 亿美元），同比增长 11.3%。【原文：Russia's dominant lender Sberbank on Friday reported a first-quarter net profit of 397.4 billion roubles ($4.32 billion), up 11.3% from a year earlier.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称碧桂园计划下半年提交债务重组计划
item.description: 两位消息人士称，碧桂园已告知部分海外债权人，计划在今年下半年提出债务重组方案，这家陷入困境的开发商正努力避免清盘申请。【原文：Country Garden has told some of its offshore creditors it plans to present a debt restructuring proposal in the second half of this year, two sources said, as the embattled developer scrambles to stave off a liquidation petition.】

item.title: 意大利为维托尔收购萨拉斯公司设定条件
item.description: 全球大宗商品贸易商维托尔公司周五在一份声明中说，意大利政府已经有条件地向该公司收购炼油厂 Saras 的计划开了绿灯。【原文：Italy's government has given a conditional green light to Vitol's plan to take over oil refiner Saras , the global commodity trader said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 零售收入激增，野村第四季度净利润增长近八倍
item.description: 周五，日本最大的经纪和投资银行野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings）公布的季度净利润与上年同期相比大增 670%，零售收入增至八年来最高。【原文：Nomura Holdings , Japan's biggest brokerage and investment bank, reported on Friday a 670% jump in quarterly net profit compared to a year earlier as its retail income rose to its highest in eight years.】

item.title: CVC 将首次公开募股价格定为每股 14 欧元，处于区间的中间位置
item.description: CVC Capital Partners 周五表示，该公司已将首次公开募股（IPO）的最终价格定为每股 14 欧元（15.02 美元），处于公布价格区间的中间位置。【原文：CVC Capital Partners said on Friday it had set the final price for its initial public offering (IPO) at 14 euros ($15.02) per share, at the middle of its announced range.】

item.title: NatWest 第一季度利润下滑 27
item.description: NatWest 周五表示，受央行利率上调的影响，英国银行业的抵押贷款市场竞争加剧，利润率受到挤压，第一季度利润下降了 27%，降幅低于预期。【原文：NatWest's first-quarter profit fell by a less than expected 27%, it said on Friday, hit by a hiatus in rising central bank interest rates that drove mortgage market competition and squeezed margins across the British banking sector.】

item.title: 即使市场趋于正常化，大众汽车卡车部门特拉托公司的销售额仍在增长
item.description: 周五，大众汽车卡车业务部门特拉托公司（Traton）公布第一季度销售收入增长 5%，理由是产品和市场组合有利，单价实现率提高。【原文：Volkswagen's trucks arm Traton reported a 5% jump in first-quarter sales revenue on Friday, citing a favourable product and market mix and improved unit price realisation.】

item.title: 大瘟疫后的旅游热潮推动机场运营商 ADP 第一季度收入增长
item.description: 法国机场集团 ADP 周五公布的第一季度收入增幅好于预期，这主要得益于大流行后的假日热潮，以及旅客在其机场在餐饮上花费更多的现金。【原文：French airport group ADP reported on Friday a better-than-expected rise in first-quarter revenue, benefiting from the post-pandemic holiday boom and as travellers splashed more cash on food and drink at its airports.】

item.title: 防务装备制造商萨博第一季度营业利润增长 28
item.description: 瑞典防务设备制造商萨博公司周五报告称，第一季度营业利润增长了 28%，并上调了全年有机销售增长预期。【原文：Swedish defence equipment maker Saab reported on Friday a 28% rise in operating profit for the first quarter and raised its organic sales growth outlook for the full year.】

item.title: 人头马君度第四季度销售额好于预期
item.description: 干邑生产商人头马君度（Remy Cointreau）周五公布第四季度销售额下降 0.7%，远高于分析师预期的下降 3.4%。【原文：Cognac maker Remy Cointreau reported a 0.7% decline in fourth-quarter sales on Friday, well ahead of analyst expectations for a 3.4% fall.】

item.title: 北京车展：主题和亮点
item.description: 中国最大的车展在北京开幕，各大汽车厂商展示了最新的电动汽车（EV），彰显了这个全球最大的汽车市场已经进入了纯电动时代，并且不会回头。【原文：China's largest auto show opened in Beijing with the biggest names showing off their latest electric vehicles (EVs), underlining how the world's largest auto market is already in an all-electric state of mind, and isn't looking back.】

item.title: 美国通胀忧虑加剧，投资者为 5%的国债收益率做好准备
item.description: 随着对美国通胀的担忧加剧，一些投资者正准备让 10 年期美国国债收益率突破去年 10 月创下的 5%的 16 年高点。【原文：As U.S. inflation worries grow, some investors are preparing for the 10-year U.S. Treasury yield to breach a 16-year high of 5% hit last October.】

item.title: 赛峰集团第一季度收入增长，保持财务目标不变
item.description: 法国喷气发动机制造商赛峰集团公布第一季度收入同比增长18.1%，并重申了今年的财务目标，同时与其美国合作伙伴通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）一起下调了发动机交付目标。【原文：French jet engine maker Safran posted an 18.1% year-on-year increase in first-quarter revenue and reaffirmed financial targets for the year, while joining its U.S. partner GE Aerospace in lowering a target for engine deliveries.】

item.title: 由于亚洲合资公司的贡献，Amundi 第一季度资金流入超出预期
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 上周五公布的第一季度资金流入情况好于预期，这主要得益于其在亚洲的合资企业，以及对风险规避型产品的持续青睐，从而支撑了管理资产 9.4% 的年增长率。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted better-than-expected first-quarter inflows on Friday thanks to its joint ventures in Asia and continued appetite for risk-averse products that underpinned 9.4% yearly growth of assets under management.】

item.title: 越南推迟推出新股票交易系统
item.description: 越南国家证券委员会（SSC）表示，原定于下周推出的备受期待的新股票交易系统将推迟推出。【原文：Vietnam will delay the launch of the much-expected new stock trading system initially slated for next week, its State Securities Commission (SSC) said.】

item.title: K-pop 巨头 HYBE 与 NewJeans 唱片公司纠纷不断，股价再遭重挫
item.description: 韩国一位因创建流行 K-pop 团体 NewJeans 而备受赞誉的音乐高管否认了有关她试图让自己的公司脱离 HYBE 的指控，而 HYBE 正是轰动全球的 BTS 的发源地，这导致这家 K-pop 巨头的股价周五暴跌。【原文：A South Korean music executive credited with creating popular K-pop group NewJeans denied allegations that she was trying to break her label away from HYBE, home to global sensation BTS, sending the K-pop giant's shares tumbling on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价阅读日本央行的茶叶
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 特斯拉的平价汽车计划借鉴了底特律竞争对手的经验
item.description: 在一些特斯拉投资者和分析师看来，埃隆-马斯克的新计划是利用现有产品线作为新的经济型汽车的基础，而不是推出全新车型。【原文：Elon Musk's new plan to use current product lines as the basis for new affordable vehicles — rather than springing for all-new models — follows the playbook of Tesla's old-school Detroit rivals, as some Tesla investors and analysts see it.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会文件显示，前高管巴格里诺出售价值 1.815 亿美元的特斯拉股票
item.description: 据美国证券交易委员会周四提交的一份文件显示，特斯拉前高管德鲁-巴格里诺（Drew Baglino）已出售了这家世界顶级电动汽车制造商价值约 1.815 亿美元的股票。【原文：Former Tesla executive Drew Baglino has sold shares worth around $181.5 million in the world's top EV maker, according to a SEC filing on Thursday.】
